sense.gloss: symbol used as a placeholder (either because a number of other words could be used in that position, or because of censorship)
that (indicating something distant from both speaker and listener (in space, time or psychologically), or something understood without naming it directly)
spoken twice in response to someone sneezing as a charm against an early death
... in the world (e.g. "why in the world?")
that (indicating an item or person near the listener, the action of the listener, or something on their mind)
there (indicating a place near the listener)

female partner in a homosexual relationship

position of a figure (e.g. tens, thousands)
